Header: Government analyst report on the Eater Sunday attacks to the court next week
Content: Government Deputy Analyst, D.H.I.W Jayamanne says that the report on the terrorist attacks on 8 places on Easter Sunday will be produced before the Court next week. He told our news team that this report will include the types of explosives, the quantity of them and the damage caused to human life and property. At the same time, DNA reports of victims including some of the foreigners are issued these days to enable their relatives to identify the remains. In addition, DNA of the 8 suicide bombers are also carried out and reports of them are expected to be released within the next two weeks. Meanwhile, President Maithripala Sirisena is scheduled to consult the Attorney General on the outcome of the interim report issued by the special three-member presidential committee that is probing the Easter Sunday terrorist attack.
